name: Crockpot Chilli
description: This Crockpot Chili recipe is loaded with ground beef, seasonings and tons of flavor. It simmers all day in the slow cooker creating a great meal that everyone loves!
Serve it with crusty bread and garlic Butter for dipping and scooping. Add in a side salad and youâ€™ve got a complete meal that everyone will be raving about!
recipeDirectionsSteps: Heat cooking oil in 2 quart skillet.
Saute onions and peppers for 5 minutes.
Add spices and stir for 30 seconds.
Add meat and cook until browned. Approximately 15 minutes.
Pour contents of skillet into 3 quart crock pot.
Rinse beans and place in crockpot.
Open and pour Tomato puree and sauce into crock pot.
Cover crockpot and cook on low for 6 hours.
Serve into individual bowls and top with sour cream and cheese.
